channel.title: Twitter Search / elastic
channel.description: Twitter feed for: elastic. Generated by TwitRSS.me

item.title:
I've attempted every major version upgrade for Elastic at some point. The results:
1->2: gave up, started over 2->5: weekend of fixing 5->6: six hours of fixing
Most recent upgrade: 6->7: minor blip of no consequence, otherwise flawless
Great progress @elastic !
item.dc:creator: (@nathanhunstad)
item.description: I've attempted every major version upgrade for Elastic at some point. The results: 1->2: gave up, started over 2->5: weekend of fixing 5->6: six hours of fixing Most recent upgrade: 6->7: minor blip of no consequence, otherwise flawless Great progress @elastic !

item.title: How does #Elasticsearch know who to let in and what they can access? Learn more about authentication (which users and APIs are allowed in), authorization (making sure users see the data they’re supposed to), and how to set it up. https://go.es.io/2pZAykZ

item.title: Elastic Site Search is a hosted, ad-free alternative to Google's Custom Search Engine that provides website owners with complete control over their search results. item.dc:creator: (@elastic)

item.title: When it comes to eliminating per-endpoint pricing, there is no catch. Don't waste time counting devices and negotiating licensing -- you have an organization to protect. Learn more in this blog post by @IanMcShane. https://go.es.io/34fnerl

item.description: Congratulations to all of the 2019 EMEA #ElasticSearchAwards honorees: @Agroknow, @AMPATHKenya, @Bayer, @imec_int, CMS of @DWP, and Wamasys. Learn more about their #ElasticStack projects. https://go.es.io/36fL0p4

item.title: The #ElasticSearchAwards Cluster Awards category is based on uniqueness and whether the project required a leap of faith that the #ElasticStack would be the engine that powered the successful solution. Congratulations to our honorees @imec_int and @Agroknow! pic.twitter.com/UwAz7MIhlu
item.dc:creator: (@elastic)
item.description: The #ElasticSearchAwards Cluster Awards category is based on uniqueness and whether the project required a leap of faith that the #ElasticStack would be the engine that powered the successful solution. Congratulations to our honorees @imec_int and @Agroknow! pic.twitter.com/UwAz7MIhlu

item.title: The #ElasticSearchAwards Cause Awards category recognizes #ElasticStack projects with measurable impact, reach, and inspiration for bettering the world. A round of applause for our honorees, Wamasys and @AMPATHKenya! pic.twitter.com/mrG1FUKjBt

item.title: Introducing #ElasticCloudEnterprise 2.4 with Elastic App Search (beta) for building modern, streamlined search experiences. Plus a new command line tool, new allocation methods, and improved stability. Learn more. https://go.es.io/2NohowZ
